extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite  Level 4 and (registration in a POLS major or medial plan) and POLS250 and (a GPA of 2.5 on all units in POLS).

basic.description: Focus varies from year to year depending on the research interests of the faculty members involved. See the departmental homepage for further details.

basic.title: American Politics
